data.actual_result: once the Hard Drive and dedicated memory is filled up, the OS will crash
data.expected_result: Discord uses less than 1GB of memory overall
data.short_description: Discord memory leaks until macOS Mojave (MacBook-specific) is dead
data.steps_to_repro: - Run macOS Mojave Developer Beta (build 18A293u) - Open Activity Monitor - Click on Memory (at the top) then sort by memory (high to low) - Download stable Discord from Discord's website - Launch Discord - sign in to Discord Desktop App - Open Discord Settings - Go down to Voice & Video - Turn off Automatically determine input sensitivity (stay here) - watch Activity Monitor's memory usage
